sources.title: Killers (1997) Deep Within us All | Horror film
sources.description:
Heather witnesses a mob hit, putting her in the sights of hitman Nicky. Now detective Dan must outmaneuver Nicky in a deadly cat-and-mouse game to keep Heather safe.

Original title: Killers

Director: David Michael Latt
Writer: Steven Ramirez

Main cast:
Kim Little — Heather
Paul Logan — Nicky
Scott Carson — Dan
Erica Ortega — Suki
Christopher Maleki — Ray
Patrick Williams — Judd

Genres: Action, Crime, Horror, Thriller
Release date: September 22, 1998 
Filming location: Los Angeles, California,

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: The deal is simple. Buy the stolen drugs for almost nothing, sell them and make a bundle. For Ray and the others, it's the deal of their lives. For Heather, the rich girl, it's a ride on the wild side. Deep in the dark, abandoned warehouse, Speed, the dealer, counts the money. Outside, a black Mercedes pulls up...five killers step out. They want their drugs back and they don't want witnesses. Trapped in the warehouse, the horror begins.
metadata.Actors: Kim Little, Paul Logan, Scott Carson
